mapper.select: SELECT CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME AS calleeReqDatetime, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO AS calleeReqSeqNo, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU AS calleeReqChasu, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN AS calleeChasuGubun, CALLEE_GUBUN AS calleeGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE AS terminalCorpCode, MODEL_CODE AS modelCode, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN_CODE AS calleeReqGubunCode, CALLEE_REQ_REASON_CODE AS calleeReqReasonCode, CALLEE_EMP_NAME AS calleeEmpName, CALLEE_EMP_TELNO AS calleeEmpTelno, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_1 AS terminalErrorCode1, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_2 AS terminalErrorCode2, TOTAL_CLASSIFY_CODE AS totalClassifyCode, CALLEE_REQ_UNUSL AS calleeReqUnusl, CRT_NO AS crtNo, CUSTOMER_WAIT_ENABLE AS customerWaitEnable, PART_MNG_CALLEE_ENABLE AS partMngCalleeEnable FROM ATMS_01001120

SELECT CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME AS calleeReqDatetime, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO AS calleeReqSeqNo, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU AS calleeReqChasu, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN AS calleeChasuGubun, CALLEE_GUBUN AS calleeGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE AS terminalCorpCode, MODEL_CODE AS modelCode, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN_CODE AS calleeReqGubunCode, CALLEE_REQ_REASON_CODE AS calleeReqReasonCode, CALLEE_EMP_NAME AS calleeEmpName, CALLEE_EMP_TELNO AS calleeEmpTelno, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_1 AS terminalErrorCode1, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_2 AS terminalErrorCode2, TOTAL_CLASSIFY_CODE AS totalClassifyCode, CALLEE_REQ_UNUSL AS calleeReqUnusl, CRT_NO AS crtNo, CUSTOMER_WAIT_ENABLE AS customerWaitEnable, PART_MNG_CALLEE_ENABLE AS partMngCalleeEnable FROM ATMS_01001120 WHERE ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_01001120 WHERE ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}

UPDATE ATMS_01001120 SET CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME = #{calleeReqDatetime}, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO = #{calleeReqSeqNo}, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU = #{calleeReqChasu}, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN = #{calleeChasuGubun}, CALLEE_GUBUN = #{calleeGubun}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE = #{terminalCorpCode}, MODEL_CODE = #{modelCode}, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN_CODE = #{calleeReqGubunCode}, CALLEE_REQ_REASON_CODE = #{calleeReqReasonCode}, CALLEE_EMP_NAME = #{calleeEmpName}, CALLEE_EMP_TELNO = #{calleeEmpTelno}, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_1 = #{terminalErrorCode1}, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_2 = #{terminalErrorCode2}, TOTAL_CLASSIFY_CODE = #{totalClassifyCode}, CALLEE_REQ_UNUSL = #{calleeReqUnusl}, CRT_NO = #{crtNo}, CUSTOMER_WAIT_ENABLE = #{customerWaitEnable}, PART_MNG_CALLEE_ENABLE = #{partMngCalleeEnable} WHERE ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_01001120 ( CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME, ERROR_DATETIME, CALLEE_REQ_SEQ_NO, CALLEE_REQ_CHASU, CALLEE_CHASU_GUBUN, CALLEE_GUBUN, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, TERMINAL_NO, TERMINAL_CORP_CODE, MODEL_CODE, CALLEE_REQ_GUBUN_CODE, CALLEE_REQ_REASON_CODE, CALLEE_EMP_NAME, CALLEE_EMP_TELNO, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_1, TERMINAL_ERROR_CODE_2, TOTAL_CLASSIFY_CODE, CALLEE_REQ_UNUSL, CRT_NO, CUSTOMER_WAIT_ENABLE, PART_MNG_CALLEE_ENABLE ) VALUES ( #{calleeReqDatetime}, #{errorDatetime}, #{calleeReqSeqNo}, #{calleeReqChasu}, #{calleeChasuGubun}, #{calleeGubun}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{terminalNo}, #{terminalCorpCode}, #{modelCode}, #{calleeReqGubunCode}, #{calleeReqReasonCode}, #{calleeEmpName}, #{calleeEmpTelno}, #{terminalErrorCode1}, #{terminalErrorCode2}, #{totalClassifyCode}, #{calleeReqUnusl}, #{crtNo}, #{customerWaitEnable}, #{partMngCalleeEnable} )
